Translations.Text: Ili apologize al vi when vi return them (el battle dir ne apologize; ni ne long fid vi. DI INFORM us VI. DI testament SEG your works KAJ VOL messenger TIAM VI returned Knower DE all SEKRET declarations TIAM LI INFORM VI DE CXIO VI done)
Ili jxur DI vi when vi return them ke vi disregard them. disregard them! Ili polluted their destiny est Infer requital pek ili earned
Ili jxur vi vi pardon them. Eben se vi pardon them DI ne pardon such wicked popol
Arabs est mav disbelief hypocrisy plej likely al ignor legx ti DI revealed His messenger. DI est Omniscient SAGX
(Kelk Arabs konsider their spending ig Di) est loss ecx wait anticipation ke disaster hit vi! est ili incur mav disaster! DI est Hearer Omniscient
Ali Arabs kred en DI Last Tag konsider their spending means DI means supporting messenger! Ja gxi bring them proksim; DI testament admit them into His mercy! DI est Forgiver Merciful
